attributes.description:
Balance of warranty and service plan
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Jac Motors westrand AGG Group offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery. You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Jac Motors Westrand Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today

The NP200 projects a no-nonsense attitude, effortlessly combining practical ruggedness with modern flair.

Storage areas such as the glove box, door bins and drink holders under the central console are logically arranged, so everyday items are always within easy reach. The NP200 also offers a full 300 litres of storage space behind the seats to accommodate anything else you might need for a weekend getaway.
